name: Wireless Mouse
description: Experience precise and ultra-fast scrolling with the Logitech MX Master 3S, designed for professionals and power users. This ergonomic wireless mouse features an 8K DPI sensor, Quiet Clicks for a more silent experience, and seamless multi-device connectivity. With USB-C quick charging and a battery life of up to 70 days on a full charge, it is perfect for long work sessions. Compatible with Windows, macOS, and Linux.
